actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Mr. Pierluisi moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1142.
On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.subcommittee: Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness

official_title: Congratulating Silver Lake College for 75 years of service as an undergraduate institution of higher education.

summary.text: Congratulates Silver Lake College, in Manitowoc, Wisconsin, for 75 years of service as an undergraduate institution of higher education. Commends the school for providing education and training to Wisconsinites for over 75 years.

titles.title: Congratulating Silver Lake College for 75 years of service as an undergraduate institution of higher education.
